ENGLISH: Building province selectors will force people to move out of the province towards provinces with an immigrator. Decisions can be used to manipulate whether accepted pops or non-accepted pops will move, and whether to colonial or non-colonial provinces. Beware though: Province selector maximum is FIVE buildings at any one time. When province selectors are active, the population will quickly grow rebellious, and the economy in expulsion regions will come to a grinding halt.
Configure the Direct Immigration mechanic to move PRIMARY pops. You are currently focusing NON ACCEPTED pops.
Configure the Direct Immigration mechanic to move ACCEPTED pops. You you are currently focusing PRIMARY pops.
Configure the Direct Immigration mechanic to move NON-ACCEPTED pops. You are currently focusing ACCEPTED pops.
Configure the Direct Immigration mechanic to move pops that are NOT your state religion. WARNING: Do not use this in combination with culture decisions above (keep focus at non-accepted).
Configure the Direct Immigration mechanic to stop moving not accepted religion.

Configure the Direct Immigration mechanic to move pops to non-colonial provinces. You are currently focusing on state to COLONIAL province migration.
Configure the Direct Immigration mechanic to move pops to colonial provinces. You are currently focusing state to STATE (internal) migration.
